Queries.Query: SELECT F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2 FROM (SELECT F1, [GXC1] * CAST([GXC2] AS decimal( 28, 10)) AS iA1, [GXC1] * CAST([GXC2] AS decimal( 28, 10)) AS iF2 FROM (SELECT T3.[ProductName] AS F1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS GXC1, T1.[InvoiceDetailHistoricPrice] AS GXC2 FROM (([InvoiceDetail] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) INNER JOIN [Product] T3 ON T3.[ProductId] = T1.[ProductId]) WHERE T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1 ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY Sum(iA1) DESCDefaultElement2Product NameCharacterProduct NameF1Element4Total RaisedRealTotal RaisedF2

SELECT F1, Count(iF2) AS F2, Sum(iF3) AS F3 FROM (SELECT DAY([GXC1]) AS F1, A1, iF2, [GXC2] + [GXC3] - [GXC4] AS iF3 FROM (SELECT T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] AS GXC1, T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] AS A1, T1.[InvoiceId] AS iF2, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodImport] AS GXC2, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodRechargeIm] AS GXC3, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodDiscountIm] AS GXC4 FROM ([InvoicePaymentMethod] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) WHERE ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1, A1 ORDER BY A1DefaultElement1DaysIntegerDaysF1Element2QuantityIntegerQuantityF2Element3Total RaisedRealTotal RaisedF3YearIntegerfalse0MonthIntegerfalse0

SELECT F1, Count(iF2) AS F2, Sum(iF3) AS F3 FROM (SELECT DAY([GXC1]) AS F1, A1, iF2, iF3 FROM (SELECT [PurchaseOrderCreatedDate] AS GXC1, [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] AS A1, [PurchaseOrderId] AS iF2, [PurchaseOrderTotalPaid] AS iF3 FROM [PurchaseOrder] WHERE ((&POMonth& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH([PurchaseOrderCreatedDate]) = &POMonth&)) AND ((&POYear& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR([PurchaseOrderCreatedDate]) = &POYear&)) AND (&PurchaseOrderState& <> 'Canceled' or ( Not [PurchaseOrderActive] = 1)) AND (&PurchaseOrderState& <> 'Received' or ( ( [PurchaseOrderActive] = 1 and Not ( [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] IS NULL or [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 ) or ([PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )))))) AND (&PurchaseOrderState& <> 'Pending' or ( ( [PurchaseOrderActive] = 1 and ( [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] IS NULL or [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 ) or ([PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )))))) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1, A1 ORDER BY A1DefaultElement1DaysIntegerDaysF1Element2QuantityIntegerQuantityF2Total PaidRealTotal PaidF3POYearIntegerfalse0POMonthIntegerfalse0PurchaseOrderStateState of OrderCharacterfalse

SELECT F1, Count(iF2) AS F2 FROM (SELECT MONTH([GXC1]) AS F1, iF2 FROM (SELECT [PurchaseOrderCreatedDate] AS GXC1, [PurchaseOrderId] AS iF2 FROM [PurchaseOrder] WHERE (Not ( ( &State& = 'Received' and Not (&State& = ''))) or ( ( [PurchaseOrderActive] = 1 and Not ( [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] IS NULL or [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 ))))) AND (Not ( ( &State& = 'Pending' and Not (&State& = ''))) or ( ( [PurchaseOrderActive] = 1 and ( [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] IS NULL or [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 ))))) AND (Not ( ( &State& = 'Canceled' and Not (&State& = ''))) or ( ( Not [PurchaseOrderActive] = 1))) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR([PurchaseOrderCreatedDate]) = &Year&)) AND ((&SupplierId& = convert(int, 0)) or ( [SupplierId] = &SupplierId&)) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY F1DefaultElement1MonthsIntegerMonthsF1Element2Quantity of OrderIntegerQuantity of OrderF2SupplierIdIntegerfalse0YearIntegerfalse0StateCharacterfalse

SELECT TOP 5 F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2, Sum(iF3) AS F3 FROM (SELECT F1, iA1, iF2, [GXC1] * CAST([GXC2] AS decimal( 28, 10)) AS iF3 FROM (SELECT T3.[ProductName] AS F1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS iA1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS iF2, T1.[InvoiceDetailHistoricPrice] AS GXC1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS GXC2 FROM (([InvoiceDetail] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) INNER JOIN [Product] T3 ON T3.[ProductId] = T1.[ProductId]) WHERE ((&ToDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] <= &ToDate&)) AND ((&FromDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] >= &FromDate&)) AND ((&Month& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (( T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1) and ( T3.[ProductActive] = 1)) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY Sum(iA1) DESCDefaultElement1Name of ProductCharacterName of ProductF1Element2Quantity SoldIntegerQuantity SoldF2Element3Total RaisedRealTotal RaisedF3YearIntegerfalse0MonthIntegerfalse0FromDateDatefalse0000-00-00ToDateDatefalse0000-00-00

SELECT TOP 5 F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2 FROM (SELECT T3.[ProductName] AS F1, T1.[PurchaseOrderDetailQuantityRec] AS iA1, T1.[PurchaseOrderDetailQuantityRec] AS iF2 FROM (([PurchaseOrderDetail] T1 INNER JOIN [PurchaseOrder] T2 ON T2.[PurchaseOrderId] = T1.[PurchaseOrderId]) INNER JOIN [Product] T3 ON T3.[ProductId] = T1.[ProductId]) WHERE ((&Month& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH(T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR(T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (( Not ( (T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] IS NULL or T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 ) or (T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )))) and ( T2.[PurchaseOrderActive] = 1) and ( T3.[ProductActive] = 1)) ) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY Sum(iA1) DESCDefaultElement1Name of ProductCharacterName of ProductF1Element2Quantity Received of ProductIntegerQuantity Received of ProductF2YearIntegerfalse0MonthIntegerfalse0OrderByIntegerfalse0

SELECT TOP 5 F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2 FROM (SELECT T3.[ProductName] AS F1, T1.[PurchaseOrderDetailQuantityRec] AS iA1, T1.[PurchaseOrderDetailQuantityRec] AS iF2 FROM (([PurchaseOrderDetail] T1 INNER JOIN [PurchaseOrder] T2 ON T2.[PurchaseOrderId] = T1.[PurchaseOrderId]) INNER JOIN [Product] T3 ON T3.[ProductId] = T1.[ProductId]) WHERE ((&Month& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH(T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR(T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (( Not ( (T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] IS NULL or T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 ) or (T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )))) and ( T2.[PurchaseOrderActive] = 1) and ( T3.[ProductActive] = 1)) ) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY Sum(iA1)DefaultElement1Name of ProductCharacterName of ProductF1Element2Quantity Received of ProductIntegerQuantity Received of ProductF2YearIntegerfalse0MonthIntegerfalse0OrderByIntegerfalse0

SELECT TOP 5 F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2, Sum(iF3) AS F3 FROM (SELECT F1, iA1, iF2, [GXC1] * CAST([GXC2] AS decimal( 28, 10)) AS iF3 FROM (SELECT T3.[ProductName] AS F1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS iA1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS iF2, T1.[InvoiceDetailHistoricPrice] AS GXC1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS GXC2 FROM (([InvoiceDetail] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) INNER JOIN [Product] T3 ON T3.[ProductId] = T1.[ProductId]) WHERE ((&ToDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] <= &ToDate&)) AND ((&FromDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] >= &FromDate&)) AND ((&Month& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (( T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1) and ( T3.[ProductActive] = 1)) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY Sum(iA1)DefaultElement1Name of ProductCharacterName of ProductF1Element2Quantity Sold of ProductIntegerQuantity Sold of ProductF2Element3Total Raised for ProductRealTotal Raised for ProductF3YearIntegerfalse0MonthIntegerfalse0FromDateDatefalse0000-00-00ToDateDatefalse0000-00-00

SELECT COALESCE(T1.F1,T2.F1) AS F1, T1.F2, T2.F3 FROM ((SELECT F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2 FROM (SELECT F1, [GXC1] * CAST([GXC2] AS decimal( 28, 10)) AS iF2 FROM (SELECT T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] AS F1, T1.[InvoiceDetailHistoricPrice] AS GXC1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS GXC2 FROM ([InvoiceDetail] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) WHERE ((&Month& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1) AS T1 FULL JOIN (SELECT F1, Sum(iF3) AS F3 FROM (SELECT F1, [GXC1] + [GXC2] - [GXC3] AS iF3 FROM (SELECT T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] AS F1, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodImport] AS GXC1, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodRechargeIm] AS GXC2, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodDiscountIm] AS GXC3 FROM ([InvoicePaymentMethod] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) WHERE ((&Month& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1) AS T2 ON (T2.F1 = T1.F1)) ORDER BY COALESCE(T1.F1,T2.F1)DefaultElement2DateDatefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalseDateF1Element3Total DetailRealTotal DetailF2Element1Total RaisedRealTotal RaisedF3YearIntegerfalse0MonthIntegerfalse0

SELECT F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2 FROM (SELECT [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] AS F1, [PurchaseOrderTotalPaid] AS iF2 FROM [PurchaseOrder] WHERE ((&Month& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH([PurchaseOrderClosedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR([PurchaseOrderClosedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (( [PurchaseOrderActive] = 1) and ( ( Not ( ([PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] IS NULL or [PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 ) or ([PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 ))) and [PurchaseOrderTotalPaid] > 0) or [PurchaseOrderWasPaid] = 1)) ) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY F1DefaultElement5DateDatefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalseDateF1Element6Total PaidRealTotal PaidF2YearIntegerfalse0MonthIntegerfalse0

SELECT F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2, Sum(iF3) AS F3 FROM (SELECT F1, [GXC1] * CAST([GXC2] AS decimal( 28, 10)) AS iA1, iF2, [GXC1] * CAST([GXC2] AS decimal( 28, 10)) AS iF3 FROM (SELECT T4.[SupplierName] AS F1, T1.[InvoiceDetailHistoricPrice] AS GXC1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS GXC2, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS iF2 FROM ((([InvoiceDetail] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) INNER JOIN [Product] T3 ON T3.[ProductId] = T1.[ProductId]) INNER JOIN [Supplier] T4 ON T4.[SupplierId] = T3.[SupplierId]) WHERE ((&ToDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] <= &ToDate&)) AND ((&FromDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] >= &FromDate&)) AND ((&Month& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (( T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1) and ( T3.[ProductActive] = 1) and ( T4.[SupplierActive] = 1)) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY Sum(iA1) DESCDefaultElement1Supplier NameCharacterSupplier NameF1Quantity SoldIntegerQuantity SoldF2Element2Total RaisedRealTotal RaisedF3YearIntegerfalse0MonthIntegerfalse0FromDateDatefalse0000-00-00ToDateDatefalse0000-00-00

SELECT F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2, Sum(iF3) AS F3 FROM (SELECT T3.[ProductName] AS F1, T1.[InvoiceDetailId] AS iA1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS iF2, T3.[ProductStock] AS iF3 FROM (([InvoiceDetail] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) INNER JOIN [Product] T3 ON T3.[ProductId] = T1.[ProductId]) WHERE ((&Month& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (( T3.[ProductStock] <= T3.[ProductMiniumStock]) and ( T3.[ProductMiniumStock] > 0 or T3.[ProductStock] = 0) and ( T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1) and ( T3.[ProductActive] = 1)) ) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY Count(iA1) DESCDefaultElement1ProductCharacterProductF1Element2Stock SoldIntegerStock SoldF2Element3Current StockIntegerCurrent StockF3YearIntegerfalse0MonthIntegerfalse0

SELECT F1, Count(iF2) AS F2, Sum(iF3) AS F3 FROM (SELECT F1, iF2, [GXC1] * CAST([GXC2] AS decimal( 28, 10)) AS iF3 FROM (SELECT T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] AS F1, T1.[InvoiceDetailId] AS iF2, T1.[InvoiceDetailHistoricPrice] AS GXC1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS GXC2 FROM ([InvoiceDetail] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) WHERE ((&ToDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] <= &ToDate&)) AND ((&FromDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] >= &FromDate&)) AND ((&Month& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (( T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1)) AND (T1.[InvoiceDetailIsWholesale] = &Type&) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY F1DefaultElement1DateDatefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalseDateF1Element2Qty Retail SaleIntegerQty Retail SaleF2Element3Total RaisedRealTotal RaisedF3YearIntegerfalse0MonthIntegerfalse0TypeBooleanfalsefalseFromDateDatefalse0000-00-00ToDateDatefalse0000-00-00

SELECT F1, Count(iF2) AS F2, Sum(iF3) AS F3 FROM (SELECT F1, iF2, CASE WHEN Not [GXC1] IS NULL THEN [GXC1] ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN Not [GXC2] IS NULL THEN [GXC2] ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN Not [GXC3] IS NULL THEN [GXC3] ELSE 0 END AS iF3 FROM (SELECT T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] AS F1, T1.[InvoiceId] AS iF2, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodImport] AS GXC1, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodRechargeIm] AS GXC2, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodDiscountIm] AS GXC3 FROM ([InvoicePaymentMethod] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) WHERE (( T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1)) AND (T1.[PaymentMethodId] = &PaymentMethodId&) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY F1DefaultElement1DateDatefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalseDateF1Element3Quantity of SalesIntegerQuantity of SalesF2Element2Total ReceivableRealTotal ReceivableF3PaymentMethodIdIntegerfalse0

SELECT F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2, Sum(iF3) AS F3 FROM (SELECT F1, [GXC1] * CAST([GXC2] AS decimal( 28, 10)) AS iA1, iF2, [GXC1] * CAST([GXC2] AS decimal( 28, 10)) AS iF3 FROM (SELECT T4.[SupplierName] AS F1, T1.[InvoiceDetailHistoricPrice] AS GXC1, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS GXC2, T1.[InvoiceDetailQuantity] AS iF2 FROM ((([InvoiceDetail] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) INNER JOIN [Product] T3 ON T3.[ProductId] = T1.[ProductId]) INNER JOIN [Supplier] T4 ON T4.[SupplierId] = T3.[SupplierId]) WHERE ((&ToDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] <= &ToDate&)) AND ((&FromDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] >= &FromDate&)) AND ((&Month& = convert(int, 0)) or ( MONTH(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Month&)) AND ((&Year& = convert(int, 0)) or ( YEAR(T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate]) = &Year&)) AND (( T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1) and ( T3.[ProductActive] = 1) and ( T4.[SupplierActive] = 1)) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY Sum(iA1)DefaultElement1Supplier NameCharacterSupplier NameF1Quantity SoldIntegerQuantity SoldF2Element2Total RaisedRealTotal RaisedF3YearIntegerfalse0MonthIntegerfalse0FromDateDatefalse0000-00-00ToDateDatefalse0000-00-00

SELECT F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2 FROM (SELECT F1, [GXC1] + [GXC2] - [GXC3] AS iF2 FROM (SELECT T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] AS F1, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodImport] AS GXC1, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodRechargeIm] AS GXC2, T1.[InvoicePaymentMethodDiscountIm] AS GXC3 FROM ([InvoicePaymentMethod] T1 INNER JOIN [Invoice] T2 ON T2.[InvoiceId] = T1.[InvoiceId]) WHERE ((&ToDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] <= &ToDate&)) AND ((&FromDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[InvoiceCreatedDate] >= &FromDate&)) AND (T2.[InvoiceActive] = 1) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1 ORDER BY F1 DESCDefaultElement2Created DateDatefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalseCreated DateF1Element4Total RaisedRealTotal RaisedF2FromDateDatefalse0000-00-00ToDateDatefalse0000-00-00

SELECT F1, Sum(iF2) AS F2, Sum(iF3) AS F3 FROM (SELECT F1, A1, iF2, [GXC1] * CAST([GXC2] AS decimal( 28, 10)) AS iF3 FROM (SELECT T2.[PurchaseOrderCreatedDate] AS F1, T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] AS A1, T2.[PurchaseOrderTotalPaid] AS iF2, T1.[PurchaseOrderDetailQuantityRec] AS GXC1, T1.[PurchaseOrderDetailSuggestedPr] AS GXC2 FROM ([PurchaseOrderDetail] T1 INNER JOIN [PurchaseOrder] T2 ON T2.[PurchaseOrderId] = T1.[PurchaseOrderId]) WHERE ((&ToDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] <= &ToDate&)) AND ((&FromDate& = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or ( T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] >= &FromDate&)) AND (( T2.[PurchaseOrderActive] = 1) and ( Not ( T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] IS NULL or (T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 )) or T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 ) or (T2.[PurchaseOrderClosedDate] = convert( DATETIME, '17530101', 112 ))))) ) AS A) AS A GROUP BY F1, A1 ORDER BY A1 DESCDefaultElement2Created DateDatefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalseCreated DateF1Element4Total RaisedRealTotal RaisedF2Element1Sum(PurchaseOrderDetailQuantityReceived * PurchaseOrderDetailSuggestedPrice)RealSum(PurchaseOrderDetailQuantityReceived * PurchaseOrderDetailSuggestedPrice)F3FromDateDatefalse0000-00-00ToDateDatefalse0000-00-00
